extendedInfo.description: Illuwa location-delivery application.You can use 'illuwa' whenever you want to call people toward your present or wanted locations.You can let your lover, friends and people recognize the present location exactly through 'illuwa'.Please try to use 'illuwa' if you're not good at navigating.As 'illuwa' can save past data which you've already sent or received, you can visit your favorite spots again through'illuwa'.Also, you can check out your exact courses from the present locations to the destinations after marking courses through 'illuwa'.If you didn't installed 'illuwa' application, please visitour official homepage for more informations and download.Through 'illuwa', you can send exact informations about your present locations with various mobile tools such as SMS, E-mail, Twitter, Facebook, and Kakaotalk.When you've met emergency situations, lost your ways or you want to call friends of yours quickly, 'illuwa' is surely useful application.If you select your favorite messages ahead, 'illuwa' provides those informations including basic messages automatically.'illuwa' is the easiest Location-delivery Application.'illuwa' wants your steady attentions and promises the tireless UPDATE.Please visit http://blog.naver.com/einsware or http://cafe.naver.com/einsware1 for more questions and better ideas about 'illuwa'.'illuwa' will provide you exact, sincere replies and give you software upgrade.Thank you very much.EinsWare Inc.
